CustomField.description: Long text area field to store the custom comma-separated picklist values for a Question where the Response Type is Picklist or Multiselect Picklist. The values entered here are dynamically displayed as a picklist in the Lightning component on Submission response records.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set the response values for a picklist question by entering comma-separated values in this field.
CustomField.label: Picklist Values
